name: rz_vsa_ability_buff_exceed_01
text: It's never enough to fill the void.

name: rz_vsa_level_08
text: Death is inescapable. And so am I.
text_simple: death is inescapable and so am i

name: rz_vsa_level_10
text: To destroy the Court of Ristul, I'll need even more.
text_simple: to destroy the court of ristul ill need even more

name: rz_vsa_lose_04
text: My vengeance falters in the end!
text_simple: my vengeance falters in the end

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_01
text: For eternity, I had but one purpose.
text_simple: for eternity i had but one purpose

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_02
text: To conduct those who transit the maze...
text_simple: to conduct those who transit the maze

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_03
text: And keep the pathways of the damned...
text_simple: and keep the pathways of the damned

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_05
text: Now I hunt the schemers of Ristul.
text_simple: now i hunt the schemers of ristul

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_07
text: With the unholy souls of the demon lords,
text_simple: with the unholy souls of the demon lords

name: rz_vsa_monologue_a_08
text: and all those who dare support them.
text_simple: and all those who dare support them

name: rz_vsa_monologue_b_02
text: Throughout aeons of service to the maze.
text_simple: throughout aeons of service to the maze

name: rz_vsa_monologue_b_03
text: None carried powers into the afterlife that could stand against mine.
text_simple: none carried powers into the afterlife that could stand against mine

name: rz_vsa_monologue_b_04
text: But an unseen architect sent a void-touched threat to find me.
text_simple: but an unseen architect sent a voidtouched threat to find me

name: rz_vsa_monologue_b_05
text: One bent not on confrontation, but infiltration.
text_simple: one bent not on confrontation but infiltration

name: rz_vsa_monologue_b_06
text: To sever the tendrils of Ristul that bound me.
text_simple: to sever the tendrils of ristul that bound me

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_01
text: Now I merge with memories of the past.
text_simple: now i merge with memories of the past

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_02
text: Before the shackles of this form
text_simple: before the shackles of this form

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_03
text: Confined me to the narrow maze.
text_simple: confined me to the narrow maze

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_04
text: Amidst the deluge, my mind is fractured.
text_simple: amidst the deluge my mind is fractured

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_05
text: But soon I will learn to understand.
text_simple: but soon i will learn to understand

name: rz_vsa_monologue_c_06
text: For now, I know all I need to reap my retribution.
text_simple: for now i know all i need to reap my retribution

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_01
text: I remember. The mistakes of my distant youth.
text_simple: i remember the mistakes of my distant youth

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_02
text: I burned for the power to rise above my oldest enemy.
text_simple: i burned for the power to rise above my oldest enemy

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_03
text: I struck a bad bargain with the Court of Ristul.
text_simple: i struck a bad bargain with the court of ristul

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_05
text: And the powers for which I bartered came at a terrible price.
text_simple: and the powers for which i bartered came at a terrible price

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_06
text: Until my storm swirled into nothingness...
text_simple: until my storm swirled into nothingness

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_07
text: My sense of self -- my life and my purpose -- would be surrendered.
text_simple: my sense of self my life and my purpose would be surrendered

name: rz_vsa_monologue_d_08
text: Lost to the shadows of the maze.
text_simple: lost to the shadows of the maze

name: rz_vsa_move_pain_04
text: I will visit pain upon them.
text_simple: i will visit pain upon them

name: rz_vsa_outpost_capture_01
text: A perfect focal point for the rising storm.
text_simple: a perfect focal point for the rising storm

name: rz_vsa_outpost_capture_02
text: This roof cannot stop the rains.
text_simple: this roof cannot stop the rains

name: rz_vsa_respawn_08
text: My enemies will suffer for this humiliation.
text_simple: my enemies will suffer for this humiliation

name: rz_vsa_respawn_12
text: More suffering only fuels the storm.
text_simple: more suffering only fuels the storm

name: rz_vsa_respawn_13
text: I wish to remember. My slate was clear far too long.
text_simple: i wish to remember my slate was clear far too long

name: rz_vsa_rival_003
text: Lightning was far too much for your bottle!
text_simple: lightning was far too much for your bottle

name: rz_vsa_rival_007
text: As in life, you'll find no meaning in death.
text_simple: as in life youll find no meaning in death

name: rz_vsa_rival_008
text: You should have picked a wiser master.
text_simple: you should have picked a wiser master

name: rz_vsa_rival_009
text: From one gaoler to another: your soul belongs to me.
text_simple: from one gaoler to another your soul belongs to me

name: rz_vsa_rival_011
text: Watching you swing helplessly was well worth my time.
text_simple: watching you swing helplessly was well worth my time

name: rz_vsa_rival_013
text: Your pathetic dreams were nothing in the end.
text_simple: your pathetic dreams were nothing in the end

name: rz_vsa_rival_015
text: Wings struck useless by the storm.
text_simple: wings struck useless by the storm

name: rz_vsa_rival_017
text: You'll be master of nothing in the land of the dead.
text_simple: youll be master of nothing in the land of the dead

name: rz_vsa_rival_053
text: You rejected the Court's authority. You die with them all the same.
text_simple: you rejected the courts authority you die with them all the same

name: rz_vsa_rival_071
text: For you, I unlock a third dimension.
text_simple: for you i unlock a third dimension

name: rz_vsa_rival_077
text: All you can do now is terrorize the dead.
text_simple: all you can do now is terrorize the dead

name: rz_vsa_rival_083
text: Too much electricity for your synapses to endure.
text_simple: too much electricity for your synapses to endure

name: rz_vsa_rival_084
text: There is no mercy in the maze for children.
text_simple: there is no mercy in the maze for children

name: rz_vsa_rival_089
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: rz_vsa_rival_091
text: You should have heeded your shanties.
text_simple: you should have heeded your shanties

name: rz_vsa_rival_103
text: Together we could have done terrible things.
text_simple: together we could have done terrible things

name: rz_vsa_rival_107
text: I was not aiming for the feline. But electricity conducts.
text_simple: i was not aiming for the feline but electricity conducts

name: rz_vsa_rival_115
text: You sent so many my way. Now you go to join them!
text_simple: you sent so many my way now you go to join them

name: rz_vsa_rival_117
text: Like all else, your family's fate means nothing in the end.
text_simple: like all else your familys fate means nothing in the end

name: rz_vsa_rival_119
text: You took one too many risks in the end.
text_simple: you took one too many risks in the end

name: rz_vsa_rival_121
text: Where you're going, neither moon nor sun will ever shine.
text_simple: where youre going neither moon nor sun will ever shine

name: rz_vsa_rival_123
text: I have not forgotten how you defied me.
text_simple: i have not forgotten how you defied me

name: rz_vsa_rival_127
text: Now you trade your songs for screaming.
text_simple: now you trade your songs for screaming

name: rz_vsa_rival_129
text: Nothing but scored and scarred branches.
text_simple: nothing but scored and scarred branches

name: rz_vsa_rival_137
text: You're lucky you didn't last longer.
text_simple: youre lucky you didnt last longer

name: rz_vsa_rival_139
text: Hear me, Omniknight. Your master isn't waiting to light your way.
text_simple: hear me omniknight your master isnt waiting to light your way

name: rz_vsa_rival_141
text: The future holds only madness. With or without you.
text_simple: the future holds only madness with or without you

name: rz_vsa_rival_142
text: You knew this day was coming.
text_simple: you knew this day was coming

name: rz_vsa_rival_143
text: Merely a harbinger of my victory.
text_simple: merely a harbinger of my victory

name: rz_vsa_rival_145
text: You were wise to enjoy your life, Donte. Now it ends.
text_simple: you were wise to enjoy your life donte now it ends

name: rz_vsa_rival_161
text: When you see your brother, tell him I'm coming back to hell -- to kill him.
text_simple: when you see your brother tell him im coming back to hell to kill him

name: rz_vsa_rival_171
text: I have no further use for you.
text_simple: i have no further use for you

name: rz_vsa_rival_173
text: Now to find that wretched B'kor.
text_simple: now to find that wretched bkor

name: rz_vsa_rival_186
text: I can't eat cookies. And the smell of yours makes me sick.
text_simple: i cant eat cookies and the smell of yours makes me sick

name: rz_vsa_rival_191
text: You trade one chain for another.
text_simple: you trade one chain for another

name: rz_vsa_rival_193
text: Even when I remembered nothing, I knew that I hated you.
text_simple: even when i remembered nothing i knew that i hated you

name: rz_vsa_rival_194
text: I await your rebirth. So I can kill you again.
text_simple: i await your rebirth so i can kill you again

name: rz_vsa_rival_199
text: You may enjoy life as a puppet, but I won't be your master's pet.
text_simple: you may enjoy life as a puppet but i wont be your masters pet

name: rz_vsa_rival_201
text: You should have joined me and dispatched the rest.
text_simple: you should have joined me and dispatched the rest

name: rz_vsa_rival_217
text: It feels glorious to watch you die.
text_simple: it feels glorious to watch you die

name: rz_vsa_rival_229
text: Did they send you to find me? They best think again.
text_simple: did they send you to find me they best think again

name: rz_vsa_rival_231
text: This is the only confluence that awaits you.
text_simple: this is the only confluence that awaits you

name: rz_vsa_rival_232
text: I won't be your pawn either.
text_simple: i wont be your pawn either

name: rz_vsa_rival_233
text: You should have left the affairs of hell to the demons alone.
text_simple: you should have left the affairs of hell to the demons alone

name: rz_vsa_rival_246
text: Zeus, you handle lightning like a rank amateur.
text_simple: zeus you handle lightning like a rank amateur

name: rz_vsa_spawn_03
text: I bring the spark of death.
text_simple: i bring the spark of death

name: rz_vsa_spawn_07
text: I serve the interests of the Underscape no longer.
text_simple: i serve the interests of the underscape no longer

name: rz_vsa_spawn_08
text: The masters of the Narrow Maze will suffer.
text_simple: the masters of the narrow maze will suffer

name: rz_vsa_spawn_09
text: I seek no glory. Only retribution.
text_simple: i seek no glory only retribution

name: rz_vsa_spawn_10
text: My recollections bring terror for them all.
text_simple: my recollections bring terror for them all

name: rz_vsa_spawn_11
text: Those in the Court of Ristul find a new enemy within.
text_simple: those in the court of ristul find a new enemy within

name: rz_vsa_spawn_12_02
text: I find refuge in the touch of the void.
text_simple: i find refuge in the touch of the void

name: rz_vsa_spawn_15
text: You'll find only madness in the eye of this storm.
text_simple: youll find only madness in the eye of this storm

text: Water and power go hand in hand.

text: Do the winds howl or is that just you?

text: Now you've really flipped my switch.

name: rz_vsa_win_05
text: With this power, I will find retribution!
